title: Captured by T-Rex
description: Warning: This is a tale of dinosaur sex. It is a 3000 word hardcore story, and it's not suitable for someone under 18 years of age.  (Dinosaur Erotica)  Harper comes from a long blood-line of archers from the Whindeer country. When her tribe is threaten by the presence of a mighty T-Rex in the valley, she takes it upon herself to save her people. Little does she know, the T-Rex is not blood thirsty, but instead is looking to conquer Harper sexually.
author: Whitney Fox
